page.title: 01GAZETEER
page.content: This area is first class farmland - mainly crops and grazing. {Village}-Dairsie (or Osnaburgh) {Country Houses} - Craigfoodie, Pitcullo. {Hills-}Airdit,Craigfoodie, Craiglug,Set. {Main Roads}- A91 Cupar St.Andrews, A.92 Kirkcaldy- Dundee. {Railway Line}- Aberdeen - London {Farms}-Bruckley, Dairsie Mains, Easter Craigfoodie, Edenbank, Fingask. Hayston, Middle Foodie, Moonzie Mill, Muirhead, North Dron, Nydie Mains, Pitcullo, Pittormie, Seggiehill, South Dron, Todhall, Wester Dron, Wester Craigfoodie. {Waterways}- River Eden, Moonzie Burn. {Caravan Park, Milk Bar, {Public House and Garden Centre} Clayton Occupations not included in Land Use survey - watchmaker, two joiners.
